  • 字段详细资料

    • accountRepository

      private final AccountRepository accountRepository

  • 构造器详细资料

    • LoginService

      public LoginService(AccountRepository accountRepository)
      Constructs a LoginService instance with the specified account repository.
      参数:
      accountRepository - the repository for accessing and managing user account data

  • 方法详细资料

    • loginUser

      public boolean loginUser(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by verifying the provided username and password. Sets the current user session if authentication is successful.
      参数:
      username - the username of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password provided by the user
      返回:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if username or password is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if the account is frozen

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String username, String password, String phone, String email, String gender, String address, String accountType)
      Registers a new user with the provided details and saves them to the repository. Validates all input fields and checks for duplicate usernames.
      参数:
      username - the username for the new account
      password - the password for the new account
      phone - the phone number of the user
      email - the email address of the user
      gender - the gender of the user
      address - the address of the user
      accountType - the type of account
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any field is null, empty, or if the username already exists

    • getAccountRepository

      public AccountRepository getAccountRepository()
      Retrieves the account repository used by this service.
      返回:
      the AccountRepository instance
